original_text: For they were pleased to do it, and indeed they owe it to them. For if the Gentiles have come to share in their spiritual blessings, they ought also to be of service to them in material blessings.
korean_text: 저희가 기뻐서 하였거니와 또한 저희는 그들에게 빚진 자니 만일 이방인들이 그들의 영적인 것을 나눠 가졌으면 육적인 것으로 그들을 섬기는 것이 마땅하니라

sentences.original_text: For they were pleased to do it
and indeed they owe it to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 실제로 그들은 그들에게 그 의무가 있습니다

sentences.original_text: For if the Gentiles have come to share
they ought also to be of service to them
